Package edu.maen.core.interfaces

Interface IRecyclingBin

public interface IRecyclingBin

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2020 / 2021

Contract representing a recycling bin

  • Method Details

    • getCode

      recycling bin code

      Getter for zone

    • getRefLocal

      String getRefLocal()
      Getter for a description of the place in which the recycling bin is installed
      Returns:
      description of the place in which the recycling bin is installed

    • getType

      String getType()
      Getter for recycling bin type. The recycling bin type is defined considering the containers installed. For example: If the recycling bin consists of only one Glass container (V), then its type is "V". If the recycling bin is composed for Glass (V) and Paper (P) containers, then its type is "VP" or "PV". If the recycling bin consists of Glass (V), Paper (P) and Packaging (E), so its type is "VPE", "VEP" or any other combination with these three characters. etc... Note: Each recycling bin cannot have more than one container of the same type.
      Returns:
      the recycling bin type

    • getDistanceAndDuration

      IPath getDistanceAndDuration​(IRecyclingBin recylceBin) throws RecyclingBinException
      Getter for Distance and Duration between current recycling bin and parameter recycleBin.
      Parameters:
      recylceBin - to the target recycling bin
      Returns:
      the distance and duration recycling bin type.
      Throws:
      RecyclingBinException - if recylceBin does not exist.

    • getCoordinates

      IGeographicCoordinates getCoordinates()
      Getter for geographic coordinates
      Returns:
      geographic coordinates

    • addContainer

      boolean addContainer​(IContainer container) throws ContainerException
      Adds a new container to the recycling bin
      Parameters:
      container - the container
      Returns:
      1. true if the container was inserted in the collection storing all containers
      2. false if the container already exists
      Throws:
      ContainerException - if:
      1. container is null
      2. container type (waste type) already exists

    • getContainer

      IContainer getContainer​(WasteType wasteType) throws ContainerException
      Considering a waste type, returns the correspondent container
      Parameters:
      wasteType - waste type
      Returns:
      the container
      Throws:
      ContainerException - if the container doesn't exists

    • getContainers

      IContainer[] getContainers()
      Return a copy of a existing containers
      Returns:
      a copy of a existing containers

    • addPath

      boolean addPath​(IPath path) throws RecyclingBinException
      Adds a new path describing the path between this recycling Bin to other recycling bin
      Parameters:
      path - the container
      Returns:
      1. true if the path was inserted in the collection storing all paths
      2. false if the path already exists
      Throws:
      RecyclingBinException - if:
      1. path is null
      2. the recycling bin from the path doesn't exists or is null
      3. the path#getDuration or path#getDistance is a negative value
